name: PTS-ProtectTheSuitcase
description:
IMPORTANT: If the screen is grey it  means its loading!If it dont loads reload the page!

SUPPORTS XBOX CONTROLLER! Gamepad may works too but its not tested!

                                                           HOW TO PLAY ActionsKeyboardControllerMoveWASD, arrow keysLEFT STICKShootleft mouse,left ctrl,right or left bumperDashspace,left shift,A button,pressing the right sitck down                                                              CREDITS

Made with Unity and Aesprite
